summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 3.6°C) and outside temperature (down 2.4°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 9%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 13330 lux) and cloud levels (up 797 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 15273 lux), cloud levels (up 1494 m), feels like temperature (up 5.6°C), and outside temperature (up 4.0°C) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 796.7m lower than yesterday, 611.7m lower than the past week, 1493.9m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 745m minimum and 3580m maximum, with an average of 1189.7m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1801.4m and 2680m.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; pleasant, mild temperatures. Also, pleasant humidity levels. Showers, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and it’s dim outside. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
